name: Find Differences 500+
description:
We offer you a fascinating App for improving your power of observation. The game "Find Differences" is a cognitive puzzle in which players have to look for 5 differences between two pictures. All images, at first glance, are completely identical, and only the most attentive will notice the catch.
Do you want rest productively? Download Find the differences 500+ to your mobile phone and play, completely for free.
This puzzle fits both children and adults, since the range of images for finding differences has both simple and more complex. There are interior pictures, architectural objects (houses and buildings), people, animals, landscapes and much more. Choose whatever is to your liking and immerse yourself in a fascinating and fun game.
App features Find the differences 500+:
• Multiple difference search modes.
• Different task levels.
• Infinite number of prompts.
• Excellent image quality.
• Zoom in function.
• Automatic save of the differences found.
The App itself is very bright and colorful, the interface is very friendly and easy to use. There is a "settings" button where you can set the language, color, game view mode, portrait or landscape modes, turn sound on or off.
Select time-limited modes or play without a stopwatch. There is such a function in Find the differences 500+ as well.
Are you ready to train your brain, work on concentration and feel like a real detective? Take a magnifying glass, carefully examine both images and find all five differences between them. Move to a new level, earn bonuses, become the best among other players in the Find the differences 500+ App.
